Mobile.Joseph Jossen House: The Joseph Jossen House, also known as the World Trade Building, is a historic house in Mobile, Alabama, United States. The ​2 1⁄2-story, brick, Queen Anne–style structure was built in 1906 for Joseph Jossen. Jossen was the local agent for the F.W. Cook Brewing Company, a beer brewing company based out of Evansville, Indiana.
